Detector.name: TPCE

Setup.name: TPCE00
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane

Setup.name: TPCE01
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction

Setup.name: TPCE02
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction

Setup.name: TPCE03
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction

Setup.name: TPCE04
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction

Setup.name: TPCE04r
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction;radius correction

Setup.name: TPCE30
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction;radius correction;same as TPCE04r

Setup.name: TPCE31
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction;radius correction;same as TPCE04r

Setup.name: TPCE31a
Setup.comment: New version of the TPC backplane;gas density correction;radius correction;same as TPCE04r

Setup.name: TPCE32

Setup.name: TPCEv5
Setup.comment: Version 5: implements full sensitivity for TPC gas volume
